gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 151, Pacers 127
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by James Harden's (35 points (21 in the 4th), nine assists, eight 3PM), Kawhi Leonard's (28 points, 12-18 FG) and Paul George's (27 points, four assists, five 3PM) 90 combined points, the Clippers defeated the Pacers, 151-127.  Bennedict Mathurin tallied 34 points and six rebounds for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Clippers have won their eighth consecutive game and improve to 16-10 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 13-12.
